Journal.Title: Studies in health technology and informatics

Article.ArticleTitle: The Development of a Digital Tool for Planning Physical Exercise Training During Cardiac Rehabilitation.

AbstractText: In this work, we describe the conceptualization and development of a digital tool to support patients in adhering to prescription of physical exercise training during cardiac rehabilitation. To meet the need for an individual and trackable heart-healthy training plan - which became even more evident during the Coronavirus pandemic - the Activity Planning Tool was developed within a user-centered design process. Tackling the relationship between rehabilitation professional and patient, it allows to jointly set up, monitor, and regularly review a personalized physical activity plan.
